summary: Comprehensive testing of NepSafe Nepal travel companion app completed. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate), frontend UI loads with beautiful Nepal-inspired design, authentication flows functional, admin dashboard operational with SOS alerts display. Minor frontend interaction issues identified with SOS button and chatbot dialogs.

ui_bugs.issue: SOS dialog not opening when button clicked - JavaScript event handler may not be working
Chatbot window not opening when toggle button clicked - JavaScript event handler may not be working

integration_issues.issue: Frontend SOS button not triggering dialog, but backend /api/sos endpoint works correctly
Frontend chatbot toggle not opening chat window, but backend /api/chatbot endpoint works correctly

design_issues.issue: Beautiful Nepal-inspired design successfully implemented with Prayer Flag Blue colors, Himalayan imagery, and proper branding

passed_tests: Homepage loads with Nepal-inspired design and Himalayan imagery
Authentication modal opens and displays properly with Nepal branding
Login/Register forms functional with proper validation
Admin login successful with admin@nepsafe.com / admin123
Admin dashboard displays stats and SOS alerts section
All backend APIs working (16/16 tests passed)
Email verification and password reset endpoints
SOS emergency and chatbot backend endpoints
Nepal-inspired color scheme and design elements

success_percentage.frontend: 80% (UI loads correctly, auth works, admin dashboard functional, but SOS/chatbot dialogs not opening)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix JavaScript event handlers for SOS button and chatbot toggle - both buttons are present and styled correctly but their click events are not opening the respective dialogs. Backend endpoints for both features are working perfectly. This appears to be a frontend JavaScript issue with event binding or state management.
